name: Legal and Counseling Services
description: SFTU has a self-help, drop-in counseling clinic for tenants experiencing problems with their landlord (also known as master tenants). The clinic provides the following services: - Tenant counseling services by phone and email - Information about your legal rights and a list of private attorneys NOTE: SFTU does not provide legal services or advice. How to Apply: - To apply, following these instructions: - Fill out and submit the Intake Sheet online. - When the form will be sent back to you, forwa

cost: For SFTU non-members, donation is appreciated but optional. No one is turned away for lack of funds.
keywords: i received a non-written eviction notice from my landlord and i want to know my rights
